name: Kāinga (2019)
description:
Game Design / Level Design / Programming :  Arthur Manoux, Killian Beguerie, Adrien Poncet
Character & Environment Modelisation / Texturing: Natascha Cascao, Quentin Bourgade
In this third person puzzle game, play as a lonely spirit trying to reunite with its ancestors, its family and friends. Rekindle the link between our little hero and its beloved ones, by using the masks given to you by its ancestors.
ZQSD / Left stick = move the character
Arrow keys / Right stick = rotate mask
Space / RT = Use Mask Power
Shift / LT = Change Mask
Enjoy ♪
Made for Global Game Jam 2019 globalgamejam.org/2019/games/kāinga
